name: Qarin (Eva Vital, André Santos)
description:
When an expedition to a long lost temple where a powerful Djinn is imprisoned goes horribly wrong, the lines between the physical and the magical worlds become blurred.

You are trapped within the ruins but, with the help of your qarin, you may yet found your way out.

Created during 2nd semester of Videogames BA degree (2017).

Instructions: control both characters, Sayid and his qarin, and interact (E) with the physical and magical world respectively by switching between the active character (Q).

Credits:
Eva Vital - Art, design
André Santos - Programming
Miguel Santos - Additional art
